creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
description: collection of poems written with different styles of penmanship; with corrections; first sections have small corrections made in black ink within margins, including correction to characters, tic marks, and circles at bottom of lines; remaining sections have corrections made in red ink, including correction to characters, penmanship, notes, tic marks, and circles; last section is of different kind of slightly greenish paper
medium: Black and red ink on paper
title: Poems with Corrections by Rai San'yō
